Lejkersi dolaze po Pokuševskog
Supertalentovani Srbin na ceni

02 Nov 2019


Alekseja Pokuševskog košarkaška javnost poznaje kao jednog od najtalentovanijih srpskih igrača u ovom trenutku i bisera koji se brusi u Pireju. 

Kada je u martu ove godine upisao evroligaški debi u prvom timu Olimpijakosa, činilo se da će dobiti svoj prostor za dalji razvoj, ali to se nije desilo. Do kraja prošle sezone na parket je ulazio samo još jednom, dok dosad nije igrao.  
To, ipak, ne sprečava NBA skaute da na oku drže supertalentovanog Srbina i da pomno prate njegov košarkaški napredak. Pokuševski će danas protiv Aminte u meču petog kola druge grčke lige biti na posebnom radaru ljudi iz najjače košarkaške lige sveta, pošto će emisari nekoliko klubova biti u loži kako bi na delu videli momka od 211 centimetara, koji nominalno može da igra sve – od plejmejkera, do centra.
Kako se ističe, jedan od klubova koji su pokazali najveće interesovanje za Pokuševskog su Los Anđeles Lejkersi! Eto prilike za Pokuševskog da pokaže raskošni talenat. 
Foto: MN Press

The Lakers are coming for Probevsky
A super-talented Serb on price

02 Nov 2019


Alexei Pochevsky is known by the basketball public as one of the most talented Serbian players at the moment and a pearl grinding in Piraeus.

When he made his Euroleague debut in the Olympiakos first team in March this year, it seemed he would get his space for further development, but that didn't happen. By the end of last season, he only entered the parquet once more, until now he has not played.
That, however, does not prevent NBA scouts from keeping a super-talented Serbian eye on him and keeping a close eye on his basketball progress. Pochevski will be on special radar today against Aminta in the Fifth Round of the Second Greek League, with people from the strongest basketball league in the world, as broadcasters of several clubs will be in the lodge to see a guy who is 211 inches, who can nominally play anything - from a playmaker. , to the center.
As it stands out, one of the clubs that have shown the most interest in Puckowski is the Los Angeles Lakers! Here's an opportunity for Tryevsky to show off lavish talent.
